info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 05 at 8:06AM EDT until September 06 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in North Carolina... French Broad River At Blantyre affecting Henderson and Transylvania Counties. .The upper French Broad River basin has received 3-5 inches of rainfall since Sunday, and this heavy rainfall is causing the French Broad River to exceed bankfull from Rosman to Brevard to Blantyre and Etowah. This will cause the usual flooding of adjacent, low-lying areas through at least tomorrow morning. The river may rise above Minor Flood Stage and this product may be upgraded to a River Flood Warning. Stay weather aware in case additional heavy rainfall develops. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...French Broad River At Blantyre. * WHEN...From this morning through at least tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Action Stage. Most farm fields are flooding between the French Broad River and Brevard Rd. and between the French Broad River and Pleasant Grove Rd. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM EDT Monday the stage was 13.5 feet and rising rapidly. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest between 15.0 and 16.0 feet later tonight into Tuesday. A rise above Minor Flood Stage is possible if additional heavy rainfall develops. - Action/Advisory Stage is 15.0 feet. - Minor Flood Stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. If you are in the advisory area, remain alert to possible flooding or the possibility of the advisory being upgraded to a warning. For detailed information including observed and forecast stages, flood impacts, flood history, FEMA Flood Hazard Layers, and more, please visit: https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=gsp
